content.description: Technical crimpy moves down low lead into the right facing corner formed by the overhung prow of Sunny Day Rain to the left. The route finishes on overhung jugs trending slightly up and right from the corner to Emotion Amplifier's anchors on the right.
content.protection: 9 bolts to the mussied anchor of Emotion  Amplifier.
content.location: The center line on the central steep panel just left of the perma-draw roofs. Climbs just right of the steep prow at times in the inside corner formed by it.

content.description: Some scruffy moves in a recess lead up to a roof that gains an overhung prow. Steep jug pulling for the most part.
content.protection: 6 bolts to an anchor with fixed lower off biners.
content.location: The left-most line on the central steep panel just left of the perma-draw roofs.

content.description: A tough start on chocolate-brown dolomite leads to a much easier finish on spiky rock to a shared anchor with Stage Fright (11a) to its right.
content.protection: 7 bolts to an anchor with fixed lower off biners.
content.location: The left-most line in this sector.

content.description: A technical move gets you off the ground to great jug pulling up the steep upper wall.
content.protection: 7 bolts to an anchor with mussies.
content.location: The right-most line on the central steep panel just left of the perma-draw roofs.

content.description: Delicate climbing on solid but polished rock leads to more texture and easier climbing towards the top.
content.protection: 6 bolts to an anchor with fixed lower off biners.
content.location: In an alcove capped by a large roof just left of the overhung panel in the center of this sector.
